ygData.subject: Re: The War of Decay
ygData.msgSnippet: 2 things... 1) Tis a great dread day indeed. I had not realized my fair home was in such dire dangers. I venture around often looking for things that I
ygData.messageBody:
2 things...<br><br>1) Tis a great dread day
indeed. I had not realized my fair home was in such dire
dangers. I venture around often looking for things that I
must do. Perhaps I shall need to venture forth and
help my City once more.<br><br>2) I am also on Drinal.
These are dark times, he of the dwarves. I am Fatedhue
of the Wood Elves belonging to nature. My brothers
and sisters in arms are the Tribunal of Antiquities.
I wish you luck Dwarf. If you see that I am on, and
I am unoccupied-- there is an easy to acquire staff
of magic known as the Runed Totem Staff. Perhaps I
can track down it's location in the plains of South
Karana...<br><br>I have been preoccupied lately and am not sure when
I shall be able to do so (OOC: Read RL been
whipping my behind lately)...<br><br>May the Mother's
impish nature and strong, ferocious spirit shine upon
all...<br><br>Fatedhue Prismatic-- Druid of Faith in Tunare...<br>the
Mother of All
